code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={searchNewBoxerOpen:""};export var searchBoxerSlice=createSlice({name:"searchBoxer",initialState:initialState,reducers:{searchAllBoxers:function searchAllBoxers(state,action){state.searchNewBoxerOpen=action.payload;}}});var searchAllBoxers=searchBoxerSlice.actions.searchAllBoxers;export{searchAllBoxers};export var selectSearchBoxer=function selectSearchBoxer(state){return state.searchBoxer.searchNewBoxerOpen;};export default searchBoxerSlice.reducer;
